page.title: 07PILTANTON BURN
page.content:
{ All map references from { Ordanance Survey map SHEET 82 { (STRANRAER & GLEN LUCE.)}
From the area studied it was found that the{PILTANTON}burn does not comply with the characteristics of a theoretical river. The river was relatively straight with a few curves and with only slight evidence of the formation of a meander towards the mouth. Instead of widening towards the mouth, the Piltanton burn started off narrow then widened slightly at Lochans village but then narrows again at the sewage works {(ref. 068 565).} The flood plains also varied in width along the burn but none were present at the end of the river.
